property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand for each other darkness creature you have in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put another creature into the battle zone, each Beast Folk in the battle zone gets +2000 power and "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a Guardian into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose up to 2 of your creatures in the battle zone. They can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all creatures in the battle zone that don't have "blocker."

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all creatures in the battle zone that have power 2000 or less to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.

card.name: Vile Mulder, Wing of the Void

Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent discards all cards from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your opponent's next turn, each of his creatures attacks if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 2 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy all creatures that have power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ One of your creatures gets "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" gets +4000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put it into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent may choose a creature in his hand and put it into the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Guardians. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that have "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap all your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, ignore any effects that would prevent your creatures from attacking your opponent. (For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a card from your mana zone to your hand. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Return any number of your creatures from the battle zone to your hand. Then you may choose that many of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return them to your opponent's hand.
